special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I, II – Support 3. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three target creatures.)[/i]
III – Create a non-legendary copy of target creature.
IV, V – Double the number of counters on each creature you control.
VI – Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
